message:
SYSTEM: Efficient_citation_with_bibsonomy.pdf: Página 2
Recent use case
• Group report (Memoria de Investigación) 
• JARG asks us to submit our CV to create the “group report”
• Process
• Send your updated CV to JARG
• JARG merges all the information and generates an Excel file. That file is sent back to all OEG 
members via email.
• You have to check the Excel file and report any wrong/missing information.
• Project report (e.g. Plan Nacional “Datos4.0” project)
• JARG sends me the OEG members’ papers with Datos4.0 “funding acks”
• Process
• I have to chase you all validating information
• I have to create a Word document with papers’ refs and a References section
speaker: SYSTEM
